entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
